title: My Everything
description: Chloe Taylor has just escaped an abusive relationship with her ex-boyfriend, Jackson Thomas. When her parents suddenly die, Chloe is left alone without the support system that she depended on. Trying to leave her past behind and start anew she moves to New York City to live with her best friend and old college roommate (Ava Montgomery). Starting a new chapter in her life she tries to regain control and move forward. In a fated meeting, she literally crashes into Ryan Chase, a successful business man who has a playboy past and has made sure that he was never emotionally tied to any woman. Ryan has done an excellent job with never getting tied down to one woman. But, upon seeing the gorgeous brunette, Ryan realizes that Chloe is the one for him and he does everything in his power to capture her heart. Although reluctant at first, Chloe soon finds that Ryan is the one man who can help her move forward, put her ugly past behind her, and protect her from the looming danger.
author: Michelle Jane
